categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Wraith Leader was the leader of Wraith Squadron, a starfighter squadron for the Galactic Empire that was ambushed by the Rogue Shadow sometime before or during 1 BBY. During this attack, Wraith Leader was killed alongside the rest of the squadron.

Wraith Leader was first mentioned in the "Rogue Shadow" entry in the in-game databank of the PlayStation 3/Xbox 360 versions of the LucasArts video game Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II, which was released on October 26, 2010.
